item.title: Zachary add a quote by Brandon Sanderson
Zachary add a quote by Brandon Sanderson
item.description: "We follow the codes not because they bring gain, but because we loathe the people we would otherwise become." -- Brandon Sanderson

item.title: Zachary add a quote by Brandon Sanderson
item.description: "The purpose of a storyteller is not to tell you how to think, but to give you questions to think upon." -- Brandon Sanderson

item.title: Zachary add a quote by Ira Glass
item.description: "Nobody tells this to people who are beginners, I wish someone told me. All of us who do creative work, we get into it because we have good taste. But there is this gap. For the first couple years you make stuff, it’s just not that good. It’s trying to be good, it has potential, but it’s not. But your taste, the thing that got you into the game, is still killer. And your taste is why your work disappoints you. A lot of people never get past this phase, they quit. Most people I know who do interesting, creative work went through years of this. We know our work doesn’t have this special thing that we want it to have. We all go through this. And if you are just starting out or you are still in this phase, you gotta know its normal and the most important thing you can do is do a lot of work. Put yourself on a deadline so that every week you will finish one story. It is only by going through a volume of work that you will close that gap, and your work will be as good as your ambitions. And I took longer to figure out how to do this than anyone I’ve ever met. It’s gonna take awhile. It’s normal to take awhile. You’ve just gotta fight your way through." -- Ira Glass

item.title: Zachary add a quote by Lieutenant General Stephen Mansfield
item.description: "Depend upon it, behind all great achievement there lies great toil: nothing that is worth doing is done easily." -- Lieutenant General Stephen Mansfield

item.title: Zachary add a quote by W.C. Fields
item.description: "It ain't what they call you, it's what you answer to." -- W.C. Fields

item.title: Zachary add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "Care about what other people think and you will always be their prisoner." -- Lao Tzu
